description: Terms related to non-binary people and gender non-conforming individuals

terms.definition: a person who identifies as Non-Binary, neither male nor female. This is often pronounced as "Enby".
A lack of prominent features of either sex, said to give an ethereal attractive appearance. Examples include twinkhons and elfmoders.
the presence of both male and female secondary sex characteristics that gives an uncanny or unattractive appearance. Examples include a man with breasts or a woman with male pattern baldness.
Term for a person that was assigned female at birth and now uses they/them pronouns or is nonbinary.
Term for a person that was assigned male at birth and now uses they/them pronouns or is nonbinary.
